Join our team of translators

Become a part of our worldwide translation community and earn money by using your language superpowers.

Work on projects that match your skills

Our translators are at the heart of what we do, ensuring our customers receive high-quality translations exactly when they need them.

Whether you prefer crafting translations of your own, editing machine-translated texts, evaluating human translations, building glossaries, or analyzing translation quality, there are plenty of ways you can make a contribution with Tolq.

Task Inbox

With Tolq, new projects find you automatically! When clients send new orders using our platform, they are immediately matched with your skills and experience. The available task is delivered right to your personal inbox.

Powerful Platform

As a translator, you have access to Tolq’s translation tools that are designed to make it easier for you to provide great translations. We continuously use your feedback to improve existing tools and build new ones for our community.

Flexible Work

Manage your own time, and accept projects whenever your schedule allows you to. We provide you with a preview of each project so you can evaluate whether you want to accept it or work on something else. You have full control.

Tools that help you translate more in less time

Tolq gives you the tools you need to get the job done fast — and well.

Style Guides & Glossaries

Available right in context for the translation task you are working on, style guides and glossaries help you deliver tailored translations.

AI Autocomplete & Fuzzy Match

By leveraging translation memory (TM) data, Tolq provides you with fuzzy matches and autocomplete suggestions as you type, saving you time and expanding your capacity.

Translation Helper

Make use of Tolq’s Translation Helper, a suite of sophisticated tools that empower you to produce your best work every time.

How it works

Getting started with Tolq is as easy as one-two-three.

1

Register

Sign up for your free Tolq account in minutes.

2

Qualify

You are tested on your ability to translate texts that mimic the challenges you’ll face with customers.

3

Earn

Once you’re approved by Tolq’s experienced linguists, log in to our platform and start translating.

How it works financially

Tolq automates all the administrative stuff related to your work so you can focus on doing what you do best — crafting great translations.

Rates

We pay fixed rates per word. You can see exactly what you’ll earn for each task.

Balance

When the client approves your work, your earnings are released to your balance.

Payout

Once earnings are released to your balance, you can withdraw your money at any time.

Invoices

All financial procedures are automated, including taxes and invoicing.

We’re here to help

We are not an automated marketplace. We are real people who are ready to help.

Whether it’s about a translation, a technical problem, or something else, you can contact us directly from the Tolq translation interface anytime.

Start translating with Tolq today!
